lore: Electro-Priests of the Corpuscarii faction build up huge electrical potential as they zealously chant their canticles of battle. They conduct the Motive Force through their bodies, eager to share its illumination, releasing it from their gauntlets in coruscating arcs of electrical power that leap from target to target.
